attributes.review: this app is horrible !! there was crashes i LOVE trump so much and i’m extremely disappointed in this app 🙄 everything was laggy and everything abt it was horrible i hate it.

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: I got this app and unfortunately I kept messing with my phone and I am NOT part of this gen z stuff but I wanted to see the plans he had for the future and the app was really laggy and yea

attributes.title: ✨gen z is superior✨
attributes.review: this app not only doesn’t work on my phone it makes my phone laggy and it doesn’t work most of the time. i don’t know why anyone would want to download this app because i don’t believe it’s useful at all. i don’t get why people still decide to not only follow this man but also download this app. they disgust me and this app should really get removed.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: So I was downloading it to get updates on our president but it keeps crashing and the news and everything is bad.

attributes.title: I hate this app so much
attributes.review: This app it the worst. And I mean the worst. Did I say it was the worst because it is the worst. It is the reason I can’t live. I was swimming and and I hit my head on air and I was distracted from this app.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.review:
I initially wanted to download this app as a fellow trump supporter❤️. And as soon as i hit the download this app it had uploaded a virus onto my phone. Absolutely horrendous!!! Thanks to this app i have to spend close to 1k purchasing a new phone. 
I AM NOT HAPPY🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: This app is 🤢🤮
attributes.review: I don’t recommend this app it’s the worst just like our so called president. And don’t download it ur going to waist ur time for NOTHING!!!!! This app is a scam I hate with all my heart and never downloading it ever again!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It took so long to load and I’m not a supporter I follow by TikTok and I give it a bad review, don’t download unless you’re a supporter or you gonna give it a bad rate, don’t waste your time horrible app

attributes.title: GRAPHICS ARE BAD KEEPS GLITCHING
attributes.review:
None of the news feeds are showing up!!! All the information is false in this app. It keeps going in out of glitch... this is the only app that I ever rated one star 
This app is just straight garbage hot garbage on a platter with a side of orange tan 
#DUMPTRUMP #VOTEHIMOUT

attributes.title: Ugh
attributes.review: My phone started to glitch when I downloaded the app for some reason . Also when I opened the app I was traumatized . I seen something so horrific . Won’t be keeping .🙄🙄🙄🙄😽😽😾😿😿😾😾😽
